update_model.description: Start application of events that have not yet been applied

args.name: catalog
args.description: The name of the data catalog (example: "meetbouten")

args.name: entity
args.description: The name of the data collection (example: "metingen")

bag_extract.description: Start a bag extract for a collection

args.name: catalog
args.description: The name of the data catalog (example: "bag")

args.name: collection
args.description: The name of the data collection (example: "panden")

import.description: Start an import job for a collection

args.name: catalog
args.description: The name of the data catalog (example: "meetbouten")

args.name: collection
args.description: The name of the data collection (example: "metingen")

args.name: application
args.description: The name of the application to import from

args.name: mode
args.description: The import mode: full (default) or random, last5days, ....

prepare.description: Start a prepare job for a catalog

args.name: catalog
args.description: The name of the data catalog (example: "brk")

export.description: Start an export job for a collection

args.name: catalog
args.description: The name of the data catalog (example: "meetbouten")

args.name: collection
args.description: The name of the data collection (example: "metingen")

args.name: destination
args.description: Destination, default is Objectstore

args.name: product
args.description: The name of the product to export, (example: "csv_actueel")

args.name: full
args.description: Forces full dump (only used in combination with destination Database

args.name: catalog
args.description: The name of the data catalog (example: "meetbouten")

args.name: collection
args.description: The name of the data collection (example: "metingen")

args.name: attribute
args.description: The name of the attribute containing the relation to relate (example: "ligt_in_buurt")

args.name: mode
args.description: The mode to use. Defaults to update

export_test.description: Test of exports for a catalog

args.name: catalog
args.description: The name of the data catalog (example: "meetbouten")

args.name: catalog
args.description: The name of the data catalog (example: "meetbouten")

args.name: collection
args.description: The name of the data collection (example: "metingen")

args.name: application
args.description: The name of the application to import from

args.name: catalog
args.description: The name of the data catalog (example: "meetbouten")

args.name: fileset
args.description: The name of the data collection (example: "actueel")

kafka_produce.description: Send last Kafka events for catalog/collection

args.name: catalog
args.description: The name of the data catalog (example: "meetbouten")

args.name: collection
args.description: The name of the data collection (example: "metingen")
